analysis.key_levels_summary: Price trading below all major MAs (50/100/200) but slightly above 20-day MA. Rectangle pattern between 61.29-69.54. Key support at 62.00-63.70, resistance at 65.90-68.40. ADX at 15.23 indicates weak/no trend.

trigger_points.action: Major support - breakdown could trigger accelerated selling
Break above confirms bull market return
Critical floor - potential buying opportunity if reached

pattern_analysis.divergence: Bullish RSI divergence forming (RSI higher lows vs price lower lows)

momentum_assessment.rsi_interpretation: Neutral (55.15) - transitioning from bearish to neutral

tm_tech_initial.position: Technical analysis indicates a neutral-to-bearish setup for ICE Cotton No.2 futures
key_findings: Current price 64.73 cents/lb is below 50-day (64.35), 100-day (65.81), and 200-day (67.60) MAs
Price is above 20-day MA (64.47) showing short-term stabilization
RSI at 55.15 shows transition from bearish to neutral momentum
ADX at 15.23 indicates no clear trend (below 20 threshold)
60-day close (Nov 2025) was approximately 65.54 - current price is below

challenges: Timeframe conflict: Short-term (20-day MA) shows support while long-term MAs are bearish - how to weight these?
ADX below 20 suggests no trend, but price structure shows clear lower trajectory since Feb 2025
Bullish RSI divergence noted vs bearish price action - which signal takes precedence?
COT data shows record 39-week net short by managed money - contrarian bullish signal?
sup_a_logic_challenge.recommendation: Adjust score to reflect timeframe conflicts and potential contrarian signals

addressed: Long-term MAs carry more weight for trend direction - bearish bias maintained
Weak ADX confirms consolidation phase within longer downtrend
RSI divergence is early signal - needs price confirmation above 68.40 to validate
Extreme short positioning creates squeeze risk but doesn't change technical levels

verified_data: Support/resistance levels cross-referenced with multiple sources
data_concerns: 60-day MA not directly available - estimated at 64.50 based on 50-day and interpolation
60-day ago close estimated from November 2025 settlement data (65.54)
sup_b_data_validation.recommendation: Data largely accurate; estimation methodology acceptable

refined_analysis.position: Maintain neutral-to-bearish technical outlook with specific trigger levels
refinements: Price below 60-day MA estimate (64.50) and 60-day ago close (65.54) = bearish
Short-term stabilization above 20-day MA provides near-term floor
Breakout above 68.40 required to shift bias to bullish
Breakdown below 62.00 would confirm continuation of bearish trend

confirmed: Multiple MA resistance confluence around 65.81-67.60 validated
Support cluster at 62.00-63.70 provides defined risk level
Rectangle pattern boundaries align with Fibonacci and historical levels

sup_b_final_verification.final_assessment: All price levels and indicator values confirmed accurate

consensus.key_uncertainty: 60-day MA and close values are estimates; actual values may vary by +/- 0.25 cents

sources.name: Barchart Cotton #2 Mar 26 Technical Analysis
sources.data_used: MA values, RSI, Stochastic, ADX, current price
